Title: Swindle
Writer: Eric Freiser (teleplay by), Bill Motz (teleplay by), Bob Roth (teleplay by), Eric Freiser (television story by), Bill Motz (television story by), Bob Roth (television story by)
Actors: Jennette McCurdy, Noah Crawford, Chris O'Neal, Ciara Bravo
Plot: When a boy named Ben finds an old baseball card in his house his friend Griffin tells him to sell it. However when he does he is swindled out of 1.2 million dollars. Griffin then decides to assemble a team in order to get the card back.
